title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to my homepage. I am currently a master’s student at Peking University, and my research direction is quantitative finance. I hope to apply cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology to the field of quantitative finance.
In this personal homepage, I will share relevant technical blogs and practical application projects.
